titleStmt.title: Dæmonologie, and theologie The first, the malady, demonstrating the diabolicall arts, and devillish hearts of men. The second, the remedy: demonstrating, God a rich supply of all good. By Doctor Nathanael Homes, [sic]
titleStmt.author: Homes, Nathanael, 1599-1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Tho: Roycroft, and are to be sold by Jo: Martin, and Jo: Ridley, at the Castle in Fleet-street, neer Ram-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The character of the trying evils of the present times.
Perhaps issued with his "God, a rich supply of all good".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Castle in Fleet-street, neer Ram-Alley
